sys_script_include.name: SetAgefromDOB

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_03dab9ba1b49d5106eb0a6c0604bcbf7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_ster2_emfs.SetAgefromDOB</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SetAgefromDOB</name><script><![CDATA[var ageScript = Class.create();
ageScript.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

checkAge: function() {
var dob = this.getParameter('sysparam_id');
var today = new GlideDateTime();
var todayYear = today.getYearLocalTime();
var bday = new GlideDateTime(dob.toString());
var bdayYear = bday.getYearLocalTime();
var age =todayYear - bdayYear;
return age;
},

type: 'ageScript'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>warwick.cooney.ems</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-05 06:57:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>03dab9ba1b49d5106eb0a6c0604bcbf7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SetAgefromDOB</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Electronic Monitoring" source="x_ster2_emfs">55b3012a1b8595106eb0a6c0604bcb35</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Electronic Monitoring">55b3012a1b8595106eb0a6c0604bcb35</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_03dab9ba1b49d5106eb0a6c0604bcbf7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>warwick.cooney.ems</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-05 06:57:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
